form.name: form1

div.span: Effective April 9, 2020 - AGASD will be CLOSED for the remainder of the school year due to the statewide order by Governor Wolf.

p.span: As a reminder, we are serving free lunch to anyone 18 years of age or younger at four locations.

span.span: Starting Monday April 20th, we will be serving meals on Monday, Wednesday, and Friday ONLY at all four locations.
Monday you will receive meals for Monday and Tuesday, Wednesday you will receive meals for Wednesday and Thursday, and Friday will be meals for Friday

span.em: This will help to limit the amount of contact our cafeteria staff is having with people.

span.strong: We will be offering meals from 11:00 am to 12:30 pm at the above locations for pick up only.
Also, we have a pick-up point at Point Marion Volunteer Fire Department. Meals can be picked up in the upper lot of the fire station.

To better plan in the preparation of these meals, we have instituted a call-in order system. If you are picking up 5 or more at a site please call 724-564-7190 extension 8113. We will need your name, the number of meals you will be picking up, and the location for your pick up. This information is needed by 9:30 am each morning.

p.span: We certainly appreciate your patience and cooperation during these times.

strong.span: ATTENTION SENIORS: If you are interested in applying for a scholarship, please visit

source.p: To view this video please enable JavaScript, and consider upgrading to a web browser that supports HTML5 video

p.span:
The Board of Directors of Albert Gallatin Area School District next meetings:
The May Work Session and Board Meeting will be held on the same day starting at 6:00 pm at the D. Ferd Swaney School building.
May Board Work Session – Wednesday, May 20, 2020.
May Regular Meeting – Wednesday, May 20, 2020.

p.span: The Albert Gallatin School District is seeking the following substitute positions:
Substitute Teachers (must possess a Bachelor’s Degree) – Daily Rate - $110.00
Interested applicants must submit: Application, Act 34, 114 and 151 and 126 Clearances to: Christopher Pegg, Superintendent, 2625 Morgantown Road, Uniontown, PA 15401.
Applications are available at the Administrative Office or at www.agasd.org
